info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 5 at 8:02PM EDT until April 6 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington OH
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers...
Whitewater River at Brookville.
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Whitewater River at Brookville.
* WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Lowland flooding can be expected in Cedar Grove, New Trenton and West Harrison, Indiana, as well as Harrison, Ohio. Homes along Lawrenceburg Road have flooded basements. Homes and businesses in Whitewater Township, Ohio along the river incur basement and some first-level flooding. Campgrounds and recreational areas near Brookville are affected. Campers must move to higher ground.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall, remaining below flood stage, though flooding downstream of Brookville near West Harrison Indiana and Harrison Ohio will continue through Sunday. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/iln.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING

area.areaDesc: Dearborn, IN; Franklin, IN; Hamilton, OH
